reviewText: No matter what your take on Christianity, there can be no denying that Billy Graham made the great commission of Jesus- to bring the Gospel message of hope, love and salvation to the ends of the earth- his life's work.  One simple message of truth and the spirit of God transformed the son of a humble dairy farmer in Charlotte, North Carolina into one of the most pivotal and influential men in history.  Hosted by Sir David Frost, authorized by the Billy Graham Evangelistic Association, loaded with extras, this DVD tells the incredible story of an incredible man who has led an incredible life.  Though Billy Graham would sincerely give all glory to God, the average person will be utterly dumbstruck by his seemingly tireless work in winning souls to Jesus.  A must see for anyone even casually interested in the story of this man's ministry.
summary: Definitive Biography On World's Greatest Evangelist
Title: N/A

reviewText: Billy Grahams is very well portrayed in this authorized biography.  His humility and diligence is simply amazing.  He is an act difficult to match in this day and age.
